213a4(mdo sde): mang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcib na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung
213a5(mdo sde): po'i ri la/ dge slong steng nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dpe slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam
213a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhonur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu che ma thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyis yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i
213a7(mdo sde): sgra srang rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cha 'phrul gyi ting 'jims
213a8(mdo sde): gnas pazab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting 'dzi mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yong su 'grub pa'i gzung
213b1(mdo sde): thob pa sha stab dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di srid ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgyal gang nis/ 
213b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges ste/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems
213b3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes dbye bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba/ 
213b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang / mang sa par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan tu gsol/ de skad ces gsal ba
213b5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/ 
213b6(mdo sde): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro
213b7(mdo sde): ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal de la
213b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par
214a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag
214a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
214a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rngas 'gro ba lnga du dang / glang po che'i shing rngas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang
214a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang
214a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin pa shegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum
214a6(mdo sde): mi dra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal ji
214a7(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na// skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i
214a8(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jog rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig
214b1(mdo sde): yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam dung pyod de// mal bdag
214b2(mdo sde): phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing dus
214b3(mdo sde): ring mo zhig na/ dpag chad brgyad phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas/ dpag tshad brgyad bcur phyir ded de phul na/ 'jal dpal 'di ji snyam du
214b4(mdo sde): sems/ mi nges bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa ngargya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'a bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
214b5(mdo sde): med pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na
214b6(mdo sde): gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis ste/ phyugs kyi shing rta la 'chal ba'i mi nges bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ 
214b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// 
214b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
215a1(mdo sde): bskyed la/ theg pa chen po me 'dzin pa klog par/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing bsten/ 
215a2(mdo sde): la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag lhan cig du 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyad par byed la kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun
215a3(mdo sde): bar gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha don byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyam thos kyi theb
215a4(mdo sde): ba 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des / shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lamasas phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go// byang chub sems dpa'
215a5(mdo sde): de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes kyi khang po/ shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang / de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
215a6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed tsong nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig mig nad kyis mig zung bar gyur nas/ de mig dbye ba dang gzum su rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
215a7(mdo sde): zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ de'i dgra 'am mi 'dza' ba gzhan zhig gis/ byi byi ling gi phye ma sngar gang gis mig
215a8(mdo sde): bkang nas// de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin
215b1(mdo sde): ba de yang / de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpal
215b2(mdo sde): phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper
215b3(mdo sde): nang mil la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas
215b4(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta
215b5(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa de dag 'da' bar bya bor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dang/ la mi de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan
215b6(mdo sde): ba la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos/ de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du
215b7(mdo sde): sems deglang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi nges/ bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang rjod du med pa bas
215b8(mdo sde): kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs
216a1(mdo sde): ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing na 'tshal ba'i mi des/ bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum
216a2(mdo sde): 'am bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
216a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan
216a4(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la/ kun
216a5(mdo sde): tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par/ gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
216a6(mdo sde): klog cing kha don byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog du 'jug par byed cing / kha ton byed du 'jug la yongasu spyod par byed du 'jug na
216a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir bzlog
216a8(mdo sde): go byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin
216b1(mdo sde): ba de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na/ shing gi sdod
216b2(mdo sde): bo chen po srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/ de yang rgya mtsho chen pos khyer ba las/ bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis/ de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las
216b3(mdo sde): phyir phul te bzlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gang bur dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po rgya mtsho chen po la
216b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'am/ sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sa// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de/ ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
216b5(mdo sde): sprul pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po yang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
216b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
216b7(mdo sde): rgya mtshor yang 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas
216b8(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lte bu ba yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la
217a1(mdo sde): zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig
217a2(mdo sde): yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod nga/ ma la bdag gis nyi ma
217a3(mdo sde): dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du
217a4(mdo sde): sems/ mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rje thog lag so// bde bar gshegs pa
217a5(mdo sde): yun ring mo zhig gis rngo thog lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhi na du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ bla
217a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa po dag la mi snyan cing mi sten la
217a7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur mi byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang ldan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar
217a8(mdo sde): spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha dor mi byed/ sems par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog du
217b1(mdo sde): 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kha na klog la/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems
217b2(mdo sde): dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ na mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa ni
217b3(mdo sde): 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang bsam pa
217b4(mdo sde): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang cho dang / mthu chen po thob pa yang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / de bzhin gshegs
217b5(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su sten par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 
217b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dper na/ mi la la zhig 'dzag rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab
217b7(mdo sde): cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi
217b8(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar
218a1(mdo sde): khwa'i snyam na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi nges nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ la ma dpal
218a2(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo thob lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla
218a3(mdo sde): ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi bsnyen mi bsten cing bsnyen
218a4(mdo sde): bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang ldan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 
218a5(mdo sde): 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha don mi byed dpyod cing khong du chud bar mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na
218a6(mdo sde): tshig su bcang ba gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen
218a7(mdo sde): bo kho na ston cing / de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ 
218a8(mdo sde): zhes dang bcas pa byed cing / der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der ngab na de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris pa
218b1(mdo sde): byed kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed la/ de theg pa chen po
218b2(mdo sde): yongasu chel zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug po dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg
218b3(mdo sde): ba chen po klog cing kha don byed la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/ ma spabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed/ bzhin
218b4(mdo sde): 'dzum pa dang gsong por smra la/ tshig mi bzang mi gtsam mi rtsub pa dang / dga' ba dang / bstan par smra zhing / de srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po ma spong la/ de theg pa chen
218b5(mdo sde): po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yod su 'dzin pa rnams ci nus ci lcogs kyis/ snying nas
218b6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bas ma ngas yongasu 'dzin par byed/ de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par mi byed la/ de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams tshol ba'i
218b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin can yin zhing / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma
218b8(mdo sde): bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed la/ nyes pa bden pa dang / mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol zhing / 
219a1(mdo sde): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang bsnyoms la slob pa 'di ni// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta du pa
219a2(mdo sde): yin pa rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mi
219a3(mdo sde): pa la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ deng yang de'i bya ba dang / bye ba chen po dang / don dang / den chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod
219a4(mdo sde): nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod do// ma la bdag gis
219a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhi na gshegs pa la gsol ba gdang bar gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de yang de bzhin gshegs
219a6(mdo sde): pa'i thang du song nas/ gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te der yang bdag
219a7(mdo sde): gis brtse ba dang / bgyi ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rang cig mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dga'
219a8(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ de
219b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lag so// bde bar gshegs pa spyod
219b2(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
219b3(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa bdag la mi snyen mi sten cing / bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi thog
219b4(mdo sde): ba ba de dag dang lhan cig du 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul
219b5(mdo sde): 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha dor mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshig su bcad pa gcig
219b6(mdo sde): tsam yang klog du 'jug par mi byed/ kha don byed du 'jug par mi byed/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog/ gang kha don byed pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na kha don
219b7(mdo sde): byed/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing / de lus dang ngag dang yid yongasu dag la/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang
219b8(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang yid yongasu dag pa la 'god/ tshul khrims dang dge ba'i chos can la 'god/ theg pa chen po la zhugs par byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa
220a1(mdo sde): chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par byed la der gzhol/ deng bab cing de
220a2(mdo sde): ngag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la snyan cing sten la/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig du 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ de dag dang / 
220a3(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ de theg pa chen po yongasu tshol zhing 'dug la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / 
220a4(mdo sde): 'dub pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed de/ theg pa chen po klog cing kha don byed la gzhan
220a5(mdo sde): ngag kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog du 'jug cing / kha dor byang du 'jug/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas
220a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems mi bskyeng la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra la/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum
220a7(mdo sde): zhing gsong por smra ba la 'ged de tshig mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing / de dga' ba dang snyan par smra la/ srog gi phyir yang theg
220a8(mdo sde): ba chen po mi spong zhing / de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yang su 'dzin pa rnams la gus
220b1(mdo sde): pa drag po dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bslab pa
220b2(mdo sde): de kho na la 'god par byed/ su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma byung ba dang / ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing tshol ba
220b3(mdo sde): dang gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu bskyed par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
220b4(mdo sde): la ma bslabs pa rnams la yang rlom sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed/ nyes pa gzhan dag gis 'khrul pa yang ma tshol/ 
220b5(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang bslab pa kho na la 'god par n+ya da/ nga byang chub sems dpa'i las chus zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag
220b6(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
220b7(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la dgod par byed/ de byang chub sems
220b8(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
221a1(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub
221a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rgyu chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
221a3(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i
221a4(mdo sde): byang chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bra la 'god pa
221a5(mdo sde): byed/ ngabyang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems
221a6(mdo sde): dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'ged par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i
221a7(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ 
221a8(mdo sde): dbyams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lnga bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
221b1(mdo sde): dang / btang snyoms chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de 'go bshi'i rang bzhin can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bgo ba shi'i rang bzhin can
221b2(mdo sde): la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la
221b3(mdo sde): rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i
221b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bcings pas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bcings pas
221b5(mdo sde): bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lda ba la 'gong par byed/ de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi kha mas la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po na
221b6(mdo sde): na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dge
221b7(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
221b8(mdo sde): lang gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun ring po nas gnyid kyi log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
222a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas gnyid log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'gong bar byed/ de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi kham
222a2(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi kham
222a3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chad zos pa'i
222a4(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi spyod
222a5(mdo sde): ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam bar lta bar byang la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod nga chud zos pa 'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par
222a6(mdo sde): byed/ de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lto bar byed la/ gzha na dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i
222a7(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po
222a8(mdo sde): la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta pa la 'god par byed/ de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
222b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chung zas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ ngochos kyi rjesu 'thun pa'i chos chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
222b2(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dge kyang chos kyi su 'thun pa'i chos chu zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ debazed pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems
222b3(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'ged par byed/ de zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chung
222b4(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lnga bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ni gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god pa
222b5(mdo sde): byed de sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges pa chung thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lnga bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / lags
222b6(mdo sde): bar sdom pa dang / nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta pa la 'god par byed/ de dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can
222b7(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ 
222b8(mdo sde): de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa
223a1(mdo sde): chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bal 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam
223a2(mdo sde): par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigasu skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'ged par byed/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i
223a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dgu kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sems can
223a4(mdo sde): la phan par 'dong pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sems can la pha na bar 'dod par chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
223a5(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'bad par byed/ de ches la rton pa chung thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems
223a6(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyi ye shes la rngon pa chud zos
223a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa'i chung
223a8(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ dnges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rten pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la
223b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rngon pa chung thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chung zos pa'i sems can gyi
223b2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chung zas pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i chos dang den dang
223b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang don dang 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/ de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta
223b4(mdo sde): bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'ged par byed/ de 'jig rten thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag
223b5(mdo sde): ni mgon med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa se// mas can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di/ ngag ni gling med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gnas
223b6(mdo sde): med par sems can 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/ kye ma nam zhig ni bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/ skyab su 'gyur zhig gu/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu gwa
223b7(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur zhig gu/ skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o// 'jam dpal dper na/ bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding lang tse dang stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa de ni 'dod na/ ri rab kyi dri mo
223b8(mdo sde): nasas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpa' de de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / mgyogs
224a1(mdo sde): padang shugs dang / btul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa deng yang skye bar 'gyur la/ ngan song ngam
224a2(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang sbubs dang / dpung gnyen dang gling dang gnas dang / skyob par yang 'gyur ba de ni/ 'jam dpal byang chub
224a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
224a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cing kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdus snyed kying bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin cig bzhin du/ lha'i rnal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bul zhing lnga
224a5(mdo sde): na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de bzhin gshes saM pa re re la yang nyin cig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos
224a6(mdo sde): yong su gang bar byas nas/ sbyin pa byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul lo/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ 
224a7(mdo sde): sems can gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de ngas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
224a8(mdo sde): kyi bu mo glang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs
224b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis mi sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam
224b2(mdo sde): dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan
224b3(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas
224b4(mdo sde): ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la/ la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
224b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems
224b6(mdo sde): can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gri
224b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
224b8(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis ni/ sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
225a1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas
225a2(mdo sde): nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig ri'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches
225a3(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi
225a4(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ri'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'a ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sem
225a5(mdo sde): can gcig glang po che'i shing rngas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

225a8(mdo sde): med pa skyed// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams
225b1(mdo sde): cad zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'grong lta bu
225b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grangs med paskyed do// lam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

225b5(mdo sde): ba spyod pa lam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can

225b7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ dge bsnyen dang pa can gsum la skyabasu song ba/ bslal pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gcig la nyin
225b8(mdo sde): gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni dbas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyeng ngo // jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
226a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dang pa can gsum la skyabasu song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la mngon pa

226b1(mdo sde): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi

227a1(mdo sde): skyeng ngo // 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi skad

227a3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
227a4(mdo sde): grangs med bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe/ gang dang gang la brtsams te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ des sems de la mi
227a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci yang med la/ des sang sa rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ 2rngam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams na/ yon
227a6(mdo sde): tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal dper na/ bya'i rgyal po ka la bing ka'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig ma bye ba dag gis kyang / sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing
227a7(mdo sde): snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig
227a8(mdo sde): las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab rib kyis bris log pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis
227b1(mdo sde): gnon par bye'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ rang shing

228a1(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan 'byim zhing / lha'i gos ngag kyang byon te/ de ltar sbyin pa skal ba gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed du byin pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mog na/

228b1(mdo sde): 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs
228b2(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
228b3(mdo sde): gnas 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po che klog gi sgren mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu
228b4(mdo sde): dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan bsgreng ba nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/ dril bu
228b5(mdo sde): g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dang sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/ me tog man 'da' ra ba dang / man 'da' ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka
228b6(mdo sde): chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ra ni bar na dang / go ta ra ni dang / dri mchog dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ud pa
228b7(mdo sde): la dang pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug te/ rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /
